â€œI'm having surgery tomorrow to remove a large ovarian cyst. This strain has been invaluable to my effort to manage my pain. The cyst causes me to have severe nausea/vomiting and lose my appetite, so this strain helps me keep food down, and helps me actually want to eat it. It almost works better than the prescription painkillers I was given.â€

â€œFresh, earthy taste. Has a smooth transition as it eases you into an uplifting eurphria that lasts for 3 hours. Very calming and relaxed, (slightly) sedative come down. This predominantly-indica hybrid is perfect after a long day or before bedtime.â€
